variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Subject's ID

variable.name: CASE_CONTROL
variable.description: Subject type
variable.value: Control with Change in Cognitive Status

variable.name: INV
variable.description: Investigator's ID

variable.name: INVSITE
variable.description: Investigator site ID

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Visit name

variable.name: VISIT_DATE
variable.description: Visit date

variable.name: CNT_EXC1
variable.description: Is this participant currently in a Major Depressive Episode, Psychosis, acute mania or depressive episode of Bipolar Disorder?

variable.name: CNT_EXC2
variable.description: Does this participant have cognitive impairment on testing?

variable.name: CNT_EXC3
variable.description: ** Question deleted on updated CRF **

variable.name: CNT_EXC4
variable.description: Is this participant classified as an MCI patient?

variable.name: CNT_INC1
variable.description: Does this participant have a MMSE score higher than the cut off score? (once age and education adjusted)

variable.name: CNT_INC2
variable.description: Does this participant have a AEMSS score of 9 or higher? (age and education adjusted)

variable.name: CNT_INC3
variable.description: Does this participant have a clock test score of >= 14?

variable.name: CNT_INC4
variable.description: Does this participant have no impairment of the 7 Instrumental ADL questions from OARS, unless explained by a physical disability?

variable.name: CNT_INC5
variable.description: Is the participant Caucasian?

variable.name: CNT_INC6
variable.description: Additional Inclusion for unaffected sibling only: Is the participant 65 years of age or older?

variable.name: CNT_MR_INC1
variable.description: Has the participant consented to visit 1 of the GENADA-LONG study as control ?

variable.name: CNT_MR_INC2
variable.description: Is this participant classified as a control with change in cognitive status?

variable.name: CNT_MR_INC3
variable.description: Is the participant able to provide an adequate baseline scan?

variable.name: CNT_MR3_INC1
variable.description: Has the participant consented to visit 2 of the GENADA-LONG study as control ?

variable.name: CNT_MR3_INC2
variable.description: Is this participant classified as a control with change in cognitive status?

variable.name: CNT_MR3_INC3
variable.description: Was the participant able to provide an adequate baseline scan?

variable.name: CNT_MR3_INC4
variable.description: Is the participant able to provide an adequate scan at this visit?

variable.name: CNT_MR4_INC1
variable.description: Has the participant consented to visit 3 of the GENADA-LONG study as control ?

variable.name: CNT_MR4_INC2
variable.description: Is this participant classified as a control with change in cognitive status?

variable.name: CNT_MR4_INC3
variable.description: Was the participant able to provide an adequate baseline scan?

variable.name: CNT_MR4_INC4
variable.description: Is the participant able to provide an adequate scan at this visit?

variable.name: CNT2_EXC1
variable.description: Is the participant currently in a Major Depressive Episode, Psychosis, or acute manic depressive episode or bipolar disorder?

variable.name: CNT2_INC1
variable.description: Did this participant take part in the initial GenADA study as a control or unaffected sibling?

variable.name: CNT2_INC2
variable.description: Has this participant given informed consent to take part in this follow-up study?

variable.name: CNT2_INC3
variable.description: Is the participant appropriately matched to a GENADA-LONG case or is showing signs of cognitive decline?

variable.name: CNT3_EXC1
variable.description: Has the participant withdrawn his/her participation in GenADA/GenADA-Long?

variable.name: CNT3_EXC2
variable.description: Is the participant currently in a major depressive episode, psychosis, or acute manic depressive episode of bipolar disorder?

variable.name: CNT3_INC1
variable.description: Did this participant take part in the last GenADA-Long visit as a control or unaffected sibling?

variable.name: CNT3_INC2
variable.description: Has the participant agreed to be contacted for this follow-up visit?

variable.name: CNT3_INC3
variable.description: Has this participant given informed consent to take part in this follow-up visit?

variable.name: CSE_EXC1
variable.description: Is this participant currently in a Major Depressive Episode, Psychosis (excluding psychosis related to dementia), acute mania or depressive episode of Bipolar Disorder?

variable.name: CSE_EXC2
variable.description: Is this participant currently diagnosed with substance abuse or substance dependence?

variable.name: CSE_INC1
variable.description: Does this participant have a positive diagnosis of Dementia of the Alzheimer's Type(DAT) on DSM-IV check list?

variable.name: CSE_INC2
variable.description: Does this participant meet the ADRDA / NINCDS criteria for probable Alzheimer's Disease?

variable.name: CSE_INC3
variable.description: Does this participant have a Global Deterioration Score of 3 to 7?

variable.name: CSE_INC4
variable.description: Does this participant have clinical data available confirming an Alzheimer's Diagnosis?

variable.name: CSE_INC5
variable.description: Is the participant Caucasian?

variable.name: MR_EXC1
variable.description: Does the participant have any contraindication to scanning such as pacemaker, ferrous metal implants or claustrophobia?

variable.name: MR_EXC2
variable.description: Does the participant suffer from uncontrolled epilepsy, seizures, or blackouts?

variable.name: MR_EXC3
variable.description: Has the participant failed to give an adequate baseline acquisition after two separate baseline visits?

variable.name: CSE_MR_INC1
variable.description: Has the participant consented to visit 1 of the GENADA-LONG study as case?

variable.name: CSE_MR_INC2
variable.description: Is the participant able to provide an adequate baseline scan?

variable.name: CSE_MR_INC3
variable.description: Does the participant meet the criteria of mild to moderate AD at first scan defined by a GDS of 3,4, or 5?

variable.name: CSE_MR_INC4
variable.description: Does the participant have a MMSE greater than 15?

variable.name: MR2_EXC1
variable.description: Does the participant have any contraindication to scanning such as pacemaker, ferrous metal implants or claustrophobia?

variable.name: MR2_EXC2
variable.description: Does the participant suffer from uncontrolled epilepsy, seizures, or blackouts?

variable.name: MR2_EXC3
variable.description: Has the participant failed to give an adequate acquisition after two separate visits?

variable.name: CSE_MR3_INC1
variable.description: Has the participant consented to visit 2 of the GENADA-LONG study as a case?

variable.name: CSE_MR3_INC2
variable.description: Was the participant able to provide an adequate baseline scan?

variable.name: CSE_MR3_INC3
variable.description: Is the participant able to provide an adequate scan at this visit?

variable.name: CSE_MR4_INC1
variable.description: Has the participant consented to visit 3 of the GENADA-LONG study as a case?

variable.name: CSE_MR4_INC2
variable.description: Was the participant able to provide an adequate baseline scan?

variable.name: CSE_MR4_INC3
variable.description: Is the participant able to provide an adequate scan at this visit?

variable.name: CSE2_EXC1
variable.description: Is the participant currently in a Major Depressive Episode, Psychosis (excluding psychosis related to dementia) or acute manic depressive episode of bipolar disorder?

variable.name: CSE2_EXC2
variable.description: In the investigator's opinion is the participant not able to be followed up?

variable.name: CSE2_INC1
variable.description: Did this participant take part in the initial GenADA study as a case or affected family member?

variable.name: CSE2_INC2
variable.description: Has this participant given informed consent or consent by proxy to take part in this follow-up study?

variable.name: CSE2_INC3
variable.description: Does the participant fulfill the criteria for mild to moderate AD at the Baseline GENADA Visit?

variable.name: CSE3_EXC1
variable.description: Has the participant withdrawn his/her participation in GenADA/GenADA Long?

variable.name: CSE3_EXC2
variable.description: Is the participant currently in a Major Depressive Episode, Psychosis (excluding psychosis related to dementia), or acute manic depressive episode of bipolar disorder?

variable.name: CSE3_EXC3
variable.description: In the investigator's opinion is the participant not able to be followed up (due to behaviour, ability to retest, comorbidities, etc.)?

variable.name: CSE3_INC1
variable.description: Did this participant take part in the last GenADA Long visit as a case or affected family member?

variable.name: CSE3_INC2
variable.description: Has the participant agreed to be contacted for this follow-up visit?

variable.name: CSE3_INC3
variable.description: Has this participant given informed consent or consent by proxy to take part in this follow-up visit?

variable.name: CSE2_EXC_REASON
variable.description: Reason for follow-up exclusion (CSE2_EXC)

variable.name: CSE3_EXC_REASON
variable.description: Reason for follow-up exclusion (CSE3_EXC)
